Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a problem where people need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can depict the use of a string telephone as a device to solve the communication problem.
The student can include clear visual representation of how sound is used to send and receive information through the string.
The student can show that the string telephone device connects two people at a distance.
The student can illustrate only the use of specified materials, such as cups and string, in the drawing of the device.
The student can demonstrate how the device fulfills the function of allowing communication over a distance.
The student can visually describe how the communication device influences people's ability to connect over long distances.
